title.en: Present Simple - States, Facts & vs Present Continuous (Presente simple)
title.es: Present Simple - States, Facts & vs Present Continuous (Presente simple)

description.en: Learn to use Present Simple for stable states and unchangeable facts. Understand when Spanish uses present tense but English requires Present Continuous for momentary actions.
description.es: Aprende a usar Present Simple para estados estables y hechos inmutables. Entiende cuándo el español usa presente pero el inglés requiere Present Continuous para acciones momentáneas.
